title: insofar as it is not already in operation, of the Electoral Reform Act 2022 (No.
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as 

the Electoral Reform Act 2022 

(Commencement) Order 2024.
text_norm: 1 order may cited electoral reform act 2022 (commencement) order 2024

title: insofar as it is not already in operation, of the Electoral Reform Act 2022 (No.
heading: 2. The 1st day of November 2024 is appointed as the day on which Part 7,
text_raw:
2. The 1st day of November 2024 is appointed as the day on which Part 7, 
insofar as it is not already in operation, of the Electoral Reform Act 2022 (No. 
30 of 2022) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

1 November, 2024. 

DARRAH O’BRIEN, 

Minister for Housing, Local Government and Heritage. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 5th November, 2024. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [593] 3

title: insofar as it is not already in operation, of the Electoral Reform Act 2022 (No.
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

In exercise of the powers conferred on the Minister for Housing, Local 
Government and Heritage by section 1(5) of the Electoral Reform Act 2022 (No. 
30 of 2022), this Order appoints 1 November 2024 as the day on which the 
provisions of sections 182, 183, 187, 189, 192, 193 and the remaining part of 
section 199 in Part 7 of that Act come into operation. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [593]
